name: Elegoo Neptune 2D 0.4 nozzle
machine_start_gcode:
;;===== date: 20240520 =====================
T[initial_tool] ; set active extruder
;M413 S0 ; disable Power Loss Recovery
;[printer_model]
;initial_filament:{filament_type[initial_extruder]}
;curr_bed_type={curr_bed_type}
M220 S100 ;Set the feed speed to 100%
M221 S100 ;Set the flow rate to 100%
M104 S140 ; set temporary nozzle temp to prevent oozing during homing and auto bed leveling
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; wait for bed temp to stabilize
G90 
M83 ; extruder relative mode
G28 ; home all axis
;G29 ; auto bed levelling - remove ; at beginning of line to enable
M420 S1 ; enable mesh - remove ; at beginning of line to enable
;
G1 Z10 F300
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5-50} Y0.5 F6000
G1 Z0.4 F300
;
G92 E0 ; reset extruder
G1 E90 F600 ; load filament
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
;
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5+50} E30 F400 ;Draw the first line
G1 Z0.6 F120.0 ;Move to side a little
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5+47} F3000
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
;LAYER_COUNT:[total_layer_count]
;LAYER:0
;
change_filament_gcode:
;If prime tower is not enabled, perform the following refuelling G-Code.
{if enable_prime_tower != true} 
M83
G92 E0
G1 E-5 Z{layer_z+0.4} F1200
G1 E-85 F1200
T[next_extruder]
G93 E0
G1 E90 F1200
;
{endif}
